prompts.description: Expands customer base through loyal customer advocacy.

prompts.title: Measure the ROI of Loyalty Marketing Efforts
prompts.content: Analyze the return on investment for {{company}}'s loyalty marketing activities, considering factors like increased spending, retention rates, and program costs.
prompts.description: Evaluates the financial effectiveness of loyalty initiatives.

prompts.title: Integrate a Mobile App for Loyalty Program
prompts.content: Develop a mobile app for {{business}}'s loyalty program, allowing customers to track rewards, receive offers, and engage with the brand on-the-go.
prompts.description: Enhances accessibility and engagement with the loyalty program.

prompts.title: Implement Gamification in Loyalty Programs
prompts.content: Incorporate gamification elements into {{brand}}'s loyalty program, such as challenges, badges, and leaderboards to increase participation.
prompts.description: Makes the loyalty program more engaging and fun.

prompts.title: Offer Partner Rewards in Loyalty Program
prompts.content: Collaborate with other businesses to offer partner rewards in {{company}}'s loyalty program, providing more value to customers.
prompts.description: Enhances the loyalty program's appeal through partnerships.

prompts.title: Promote the Loyalty Program to Increase Enrollment
prompts.content: Develop a marketing plan to promote {{business}}'s loyalty program to existing and potential customers, highlighting benefits and ease of joining.
prompts.description: Aims to grow the loyalty program membership base.
